attributes.action: keep protected sights protected from developers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ensure legislation is adhered to. to stop developers like 'Trump International' (who admit it will destroy the dunes)building on 'protected sites' like FOVERAN LINKS on the Aberdeenshire coast which is a site of special scientific interest (SSSI).
there are sufficient Golf links to meet demand.There is not sufficient (SSSI)
